Variable.Name: order
base
Variable.Comment: Receiver reference time [enumerated] 0 — GPS 1 — UTC_USNO 2 — GLONASS 3 — UTC_SU 4…254 — Reserved

StandardMessage.Name: RcvTimeOffset
StandardMessage.Title: [TO] Reference Time to Receiver Time Offset

Variable.Name: dn
Variable.Comment: GLONASS day number (modulo 4 years starting from 1996) []

Variable.Name: utc
Variable.Comment: WAAS to UTC time offset parameters

StandardMessage.Name: GalUtcGpsParam
StandardMessage.Title: [EU] GALILEO UTC and GPS Time Parameters

Variable.Name: utc
Variable.Comment: GALILEO to UTC time offset parameters GALILEO to GPS time offset parameters

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: Flags of data availability [bitfield] 0 - GGTO availability 1…15 - reserved

StandardMessage.Name: GloUtcGpsParam
StandardMessage.Title: [NU] GLONASS UTC and GPS Time Parameters

Variable.Name: tauSys
Variable.Comment: Time correction to GLONASS time scale (vs. UTC(SU)) tauSys = Tutc(su) - Tglo [s]

Variable.Name: time
Variable.Comment: Solution time. Tr modulo 1 day (86400000 ms)[ms]

Variable.Name: time
Variable.Comment: receiver time of the baseline estimate [s]

Variable.Name: gpsAvail
Variable.Comment: Number of GPS SVs available for positioning

Variable.Name: gloAvail
Variable.Comment: Number of GLONASS SVs available for positioning

Variable.Name: gpsUsed
Variable.Comment: Number of GPS SVs used in positioning

Variable.Name: gloUsed
Variable.Comment: Number of GLONASS SVs used in positioning

Variable.Name: fixProg
Variable.Comment: Ambiguity fixing progress indicator controllable by RTK engine [%]

Variable.Name: sv
Variable.Comment: SV PRN number within the range [1…37]

Variable.Name: healthA
Variable.Comment: Health summary (from almanac), [bitfield] 0…4 - code for health of SV signal components 5…7 - navigation data health indicators

Variable.Name: config
Variable.Comment: Satellite configuration (page 25 of subframe 4) [bitfield]: 0…2 - satellite configuration 3 - anti-spoofing flag 4…7 - reserved ======= Clock data =======

Variable.Name: af0
Variable.Comment: Polynomial coefficient [s] ===== Ephemeris data ===== --- Keplerian orbital parameters ---

Variable.Name: rootA
Variable.Comment: Square root of the semi-major axis [m^0.5]

Variable.Name: omega0
Variable.Comment: Longitude of ascending node of orbit plane at the start of week ‘wna’ [semi-circles]

Variable.Name: argPer
Variable.Comment: Argument of perigee [semi-circles] --- Corrections to orbital parameters ---

Variable.Name: gps
Variable.Comment: Without ‘cs’ field, gps.sv within the range [1…30] GALILEO-Specific data

Variable.Name: dna
Variable.Comment: Day number within 4-year period starting with the leap year []

Variable.Name: tlam
Variable.Comment: Time of the first ascending node passage on day ‘dna’ [s]

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: Satellite flags [bitfield]: 0 - health: 1 - healthy SV, as specified by ‘Cn’, 0 - unhealthy 1 - SVs type: 0 - GLONASS, 1 - GLONASS-M 2…7 - reserved ======= Clock data =======

Variable.Name: tauN
Variable.Comment: Coarse time correction to SV clock with respect to GLONASS system time [s]

Variable.Name: tauSys
Variable.Comment: Correction to GLONASS system time with respect to UTC(SU) [s] ===== Ephemeris data =====

Variable.Name: lambda
Variable.Comment: Longitude of ascending node at reference time ‘tlam’ [semi-circles]

Variable.Name: argPer
Variable.Comment: Argument of perigee at reference time ‘tlam’ [semi-circles]

Variable.Name: delT
Variable.Comment: Correction to mean Draconic period at reference time ‘tlam’ [s/period]

Variable.Name: delTdt
Variable.Comment: Rate of change of Draconic period [s/period^2]

Variable.Name: deli
Variable.Comment: Correction to inclination at reference time ‘tlam’[semi-circles]

Variable.Name: gpsPrn
Variable.Comment: GPS SV PRN associated with WAAS SV

Variable.Name: healthS
Variable.Comment: Satellite health [bitfield]: 0 - 0–Ranging on, 1–off 1 - 0–Corrections on, 1-off 2 - 0–Broadcast Integrity on, 1-off 3 - reserved 4…7 - are set to zero

Variable.Name: tow
Variable.Comment: time of GPS week almanac was received at

Variable.Name: wn
Variable.Comment: GPS week this almanac was received at

Variable.Name: sv
Variable.Comment: SV PRN number within the range [1…37]

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: Flags (see GPS ICD for details)[bitfield]: 0 - curve fit interval 1 - data flag for L2 P-code 2,3 - code on L2 channel 4 - anti-spoof (A-S) flag (from HOW) 5 - ‘Alert’ flag (from HOW) 6 - ephemeris was retrieved from non-volatile memory 7 - reserved ===== Clock data (Subframe 1) =====

Variable.Name: iode
Variable.Comment: Issue of data, ephemeris [] --- Keplerian orbital parameters ---

Variable.Name: rootA
Variable.Comment: Square root of the semi-major axis [m^0.5]

Variable.Name: omega0
Variable.Comment: Longitude of ascending node of orbit plane at the start of week ‘wn’ [semi-circles]

Variable.Name: argPer
Variable.Comment: Argument of perigee [semi-circles] --- Corrections to orbital parameters ---

Variable.Name: deln
Variable.Comment: Mean motion difference from computed value [semi-circle/s]

Variable.Name: crc
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the cosine harmonic correction term to the orbit radius [m]

Variable.Name: crs
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the cosine harmonic correction term to the orbit radius [m]

Variable.Name: cuc
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the cosine harmonic correction term to the argument of latitude [rad]

Variable.Name: cus
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the cosine harmonic correction term to the argument of latitude [rad]

Variable.Name: cic
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the cosine harmonic correction term to the angle of inclination [rad]

Variable.Name: cis
Variable.Comment: Amplitude of the sine harmonic correction term to the angle of inclination [rad]

Variable.Name: tk
Variable.Comment: Frame start time within current day [s]

Variable.Name: health
Variable.Comment: Satellite health [bitfield] 0 - MSB taken from Bn word which indicates satellite health: 1 - satellite is unhealthy 0 - satellite is healthy 1 - If set, this flag indicates that params ‘tau’ and ‘gamma’ may be wrong (Note that receiver performs several ‘internal’ data consistency checks allowing detection of problem broadcast parameters) 2 - If set, this flag indicates that initial conditions ‘r[3]’ and ‘v[3]’ may be wrong 3 - SV health (Cn word) status from almanac: 0 - satellite is unhealthy 1 - satellite is healthy 4 - If set, this flag indicates that SV health status from almanac is available 5…7 - reserved ===== Ephemeris data ======

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: Flags (for details, see GLONASS ICD) [bitfield]: 0…1 - p1 word 2 - p2 word 3 - p3 word 4…5 - 2 LSB taken from Bn word 6 - ephemeris was retrieved from NV-memory 7 - SV is GLONASS-M or newer

Variable.Name: w
Variable.Comment: Satellite PE-90 accelerations due to Luni-Solar gravitational perturbations [km/s^2] ===== Clock data ======

Variable.Name: tauSys
Variable.Comment: Time correction to GLONASS time scale (vs. UTC(SU)) tauSys = TUTC(SU) - TGLN [s]

Variable.Name: tau
Variable.Comment: Correction to satellite clock (vs. GLONASS time) tau = TGLN - TSV [s]

Variable.Name: gamma
Variable.Comment: Rate of satellite clock offset [s/s] ===== GLONASS-M data ======

Variable.Name: fDelTauN
Variable.Comment: Delta Tau N - delay between L1 and L2 [s]

Variable.Name: nFt
Variable.Comment: Ft (User Range Accuracy), see GLONASS ICD for values

Variable.Name: flags2
Variable.Comment: Flags (for details, see GLONASS ICD) [bitfield]: 0 - GLONASS-M ln (third string) 1…2 - GLONASS-M P 3 - GLONASS-M P4 4…5 - GLONASS-M M 6 - GLONASS-M ln (fifth string) 7…15 - reserved

Variable.Name: gpsPrn
Variable.Comment: GPS SV PRN associated with WAAS SV

Variable.Name: tow
Variable.Comment: Time of GPS week this ephemeris was received at

Variable.Name: wn
Variable.Comment: GPS week this ephemeris was received at

Variable.Name: gps
Variable.Comment: Without ‘cs’ field, gps.sv within the range [1…30] GALILEO-specific data

Variable.Name: navType
Variable.Comment: Type of navigation data: 0 - GALILEO E1B(INAV) 3 - GIOVE E1B

Variable.Name: dat
Variable.Comment: Satellite data. “N” can be derived from the following expression: N=([Message Length] - 2) / recSize)

Variable.Name: dat
Variable.Comment: Satellite data. “N” can be derived from the following expression: N=([Message Length] - 2) / recSize)

Variable.Name: prn
Variable.Comment: SV PRN number within the range [120…138]

Variable.Name: prn
Variable.Comment: SV PRN number within the range [1…30]

Variable.Name: type
Variable.Comment: Type of data: 0 - GALILEO E1B(INAV) 3 - GIOVE E1B

Variable.Name: len
Variable.Comment: Length of the navigation data block ‘data’

Variable.Name: q00
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q01
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q02
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q12
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: rms
Variable.Comment: estimated accuracy for three baseline vectors [m]

Variable.Name: solType
Variable.Comment: solution type10 for three baseline vectors

Variable.Name: flag
Variable.Comment: 0 – components of matrix Q are invalid, 1 - valid

Variable.Name: q00
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q01
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q02
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: q12
Variable.Comment: components of the rotation matrix Q []

Variable.Name: rms
Variable.Comment: estimated accuracy for three baseline vectors [m]

Variable.Name: solType
Variable.Comment: solution type10 for three baseline vectors

Variable.Name: flag
Variable.Comment: 0 – components of matrix Q are invalid, 1 - valid

Variable.Name: bl0
Variable.Comment: baseline vector M-S0 in the current epoch[m]

Variable.Name: bl1
Variable.Comment: baseline vector M-S1 in the current epoch[m]

Variable.Name: bl2
Variable.Comment: baseline vector M-S2 in the current epoch[m]

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: flags [bitfield]: 0: 0 - no data available 1 - data are valid 7…1: reserved

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: flags [bitfield]: 0: 0 - no data available 1 - data are valid 7…1: reserved

Variable.Name: ms
Variable.Comment: ms part of event time tag

Variable.Name: ns
Variable.Comment: ns part of event time tag

StandardMessage.Name: RcvTimeOffsAtPPS
StandardMessage.Title: [YA], [YB] Time Offset at PPS Generation Time

Variable.Name: scale
reftime
clock
Variable.Comment: Clock offset: 15…2: Clock offset -213 /+(213-1) [125 nanoseconds]: 1…0: Clock offset ID: 0 – clock offset is unavailable 1 – [GPS - Receiver time] 2 – [GLONASS - Receiver time] 3 - reserved

Variable.Name: flags
Variable.Comment: Flags [bitfield]: 15…13: message version [0…7] 12…8: total number of “svd” records (N) 7…5: this value plus 6 makes the length of the structure “Header” in bytes 4…0: this value plus 10 (for “version” 0 and 1), or 6 (for “version” [2…7]) makes the length of the structure “SlotRec” in bytes

Variable.Name: delta
Variable.Comment: [bitfield]: 15…5: Difference between the raw measurement time (available from either [rM] or [rE] message) and the position time tag [-1024…1023], [5 ms] 4…0: reserved

Variable.Name: word2
Variable.Comment: [bitfield]: 31…24: 8 LSB of Position ECEF X-component [10-4 m] or Latitude [10-11 radians] or Grid (Local) X-component [10-4 m]; 23: 1 - indicates that Position is valid 22…21: 0 – Position is given in ECEF system 1 – Position is given in geodetic coordinates (latitude, longitude, height above ellipsoid) 2 – Position is given in grid (or local) coordinates 3 – reserved 20…16: Number of GPS SVs used in computation; 15: 1 - indicates that Velocity is valid 14…13: reserved 12…8: Number of GLONASS SVs used in computation; 7…4: Position computation mode (see Table 4-3 on page 306); 3…0: Velocity computation mode (see Table 4-3 on page 306);

Variable.Name: word4
word6
word7
word8
word9
recSize
Variable.Comment: Size of data block, in bytes, that corresponds to the given satellite system (8 bytes currently);

Variable.Name: Offs
Variable.Comment: Clock offsets (see below). ‘N’ can be derived from the following expression: N = (len - 7) / recSize, where ‘len’ is message body length taken from message header

Variable.Name: wn
Variable.Comment: Week number (taken from the first subframe) The coefficients of a cubic equation representing the amplitude of the vertical delay

Variable.Name: alpha3
Variable.Comment: [s/semicircles3] The coefficients of a cubic equation representing the period of the model

Variable.Name: time
Variable.Comment: Receiver time of event occurrence modulo day, [ms]

Variable.Name: lastBitTime
Variable.Comment: Time since the last history shift [ms]

Variable.Name: dtls
Variable.Comment: Delta time due to leap seconds [s]

Variable.Name: dtlsf
Variable.Comment: 'Future' delta time due to leap seconds [s]

Variable.Name: cnt
Variable.Comment: Counter which is updated upon receiving a new sub-frame for given satellite.

Variable.Name: data
Variable.Comment: GPS sub-frame contents. Every 4-bytes word contains 30 LSB of the GPS navigation data.

Variable.Name: cnt
Variable.Comment: Counter which is updated upon receiving a string of a GLONASS sub-frame for given FCN.

Variable.Name: data
Variable.Comment: GLONASS string contents. Every 4-bytes word contains 25 LSB of the string of GLONASS sub-frame.

Variable.Name: num
Variable.Comment: Number of slot records (M) [bitfield]: 7…3: reserved 2…0: number of slot records minus one (M)

Variable.Name: svstOrDelrange
Variable.Comment: SV status [bitfield], or Delta pseudo-range [0.02 meters]. SV status [bitfield]: 15…11: GLONASS slot number (for GPS SV the field is undefined), [0…24], 0 - unknown 10…6: Channel number [0…31], 31 - unavailable 5…0: SV navigation status Delta pseudo-range [0.02 meters]: [full pseudo-range for given slot]-[refrange]

Variable.Name: word1
Variable.Comment: Packed data 1 [bitfield]: 31…12: [carrier phase] - [refrange] [-219…(219-1)] [0.0005 meters] 11…9: slot ID: 0 - C/A L1; 1 - P1; 2 - P2; 3 - C/A L2; 4 - L5; 5,6,7 - reserved 8: reserved 7: signal lock loop flags are available 6: lock time is available 5…0: Signal-to-noise ratio [dB*Hz]

Variable.Name: lock
Variable.Comment: Packed data 2 [bitfield]: 15…12: fractional part of Signal-to-noise ratio [0.1 dB*Hz] 11…10: reserved 9…0: lock time [0.1 second]. Tracking time since last loss of lock. Varies between 0 and 102.3 seconds. “Gets stuck” at 102.3s after the actual tracking time exceeds this value (until another loss of lock occurs).

Variable.Name: word2
Variable.Comment: Packed data 3. Only present for “version” 0 [bitfield]: 31…7: Doppler [-224…(224-1)], [0.001 Hz] 6…0: reserved

Variable.Name: word1
word2
